name: Whipped Coffee
description: Embark on a caffeinated adventure with whipped coffee, a viral sensation that's taken the world by storm. With just three simple ingredients, you can recreate the magic of a bustling South Korean cafe right in your own kitchen. Mix hot water, sugar, and instant coffee in a bowl, then whisk until the mixture transforms into a cloud-like foam. Spoon the foam over ice-cold milk in a glass and watch the creamy coffee cascade through the milk, creating a mesmerizing swirl of flavors. Whether you're seeking a morning pick-me-up or a delightful afternoon treat, whipped coffee promises to elevate your coffee-drinking ritual to new heights!
instructions: Add the hot water, sugar, and instant coffee to a bowl.
Either hand whisk or use an electric mixer until the mixture is fluffy and light.
To serve, spoon a dollop over a cup of milk with ice in it and stir.
